name: nonearning
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not producing or earning income: Nonearning assets include property which does not increase in value over time. Non-earning members of the group need to contribute in other ways.
More examplesFewer examplesA range of government benefits are available for non-earning parents.They have decided to dispose of their nonearning assets which have not delivered a return for many years.Ownership of joint assets can be transferred to a nonearning spouse in order to reduce tax liability.
